name: ABC8Charleston
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The ABC 8 Flash Briefing brings you Charleston area news and weather as well as top stories from around the world. Get the latest throughout the day, direct from our news staff.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
